data.text: @MadForMaple Scary. It makes me think what does the government know that everyone else doesn't. Stay safe.
@LysanderWrites @MadForMaple I was here in 2020. The restrictions are much greater now then they were then.
@DuncanInWarabi We live just outside too. Many of the barricaded areas have no cases…..so weird and true!
@MadForMaple Sorry you have to go through this. Hang in, kiddos and all.
@MadForMaple Wow - we live just outside the exclusion zone. Not sure why it’s all being bordered up as no cases being reported in this area
@garebear75 People were told the 4th, then the 7th, but more barriers are going up this weekend so I doubt it. We have no idea.
@MadForMaple yeah  so  bad   Be careful  bro
@MadForMaple Are they saying when people can go out of their compounds again. I'm in Futian. Many places here were originally told March 8th, but I don't think that's going to happen.
